message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a method for infrared action recognition using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and global temporal representation. This falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of deep learning and feature extraction also suggests artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as a likely sub-category. The application of the method to video data indicates multimedia (cs.MM) as another possible sub-category. Finally, the use of infrared data suggests the sub-category of information retrieval (cs.IR) as a potential fit.
